description.narrative: This activity (Humanitarian Preparedness and Response Funds) is a component of Bangladesh Humanitarian Preparedness and Response reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £223,838. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Material relief assistance and services , Emergency food assistance, Relief co-ordination and support services. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, Danish Refugee Council. The start date is 27-06-2011 and the end date is 31-03-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
